name: The Strand Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed in the Strand Hotel for a family get together last weekend and we were very pleased with the standard of service and value.Our rooms were large and spacious and the power showers were just wonderful.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay and good service.Great breakfasts!

reviews.text: The breakfasts were excellent and the staff couldn't have been more helpful.We availed of a special offer and it was great value for money.As the Spring weather was very pleasant we had an opportunity to enjoy this lovely part of Donegal again.
reviews.title: SUPERB!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I organised a surprise 60th party for my husband here last week for 60+ people with a 4 course sit down meal, band and disco.We had been planning it since February and found throughout that the staff would bend over backwards to help us. Friendly and approachable,accommodating and empathetic in one of the worst weeks for weather ever known!!! Our party was unforgettable,the food was delicious and plentiful(our guests said they'd done nothing but eat all weekend!!)service superb and nothing was too much trouble. will certainly plan future functions here and recommend to others.
reviews.title: Disappointed with standard of food compared with 2008 visit

description: Family run Hotel, near to Ballyliffin Golf Club and overlooking the beautiful Pollan beach. Ideal location for family holidays, a short break, your wedding or a conference.
